interview.session_error_message: There was a problem with the interview session. Would you like to try again?
interview.session_expired_message: Your interview session has expired due to inactivity. Start a new session to continue.
interview.timeline_tip: Include a year and place in your memories to help us position them perfectly on your timeline.
interview.voice_tip: Try using voice input for longer memories - it's often easier than typing and feels more natural!
interview.image_tip: Make your memories come alive by adding photos! You can upload existing images or take new ones with your webcam.
interview.separate_tip: Share one memory at a time and click 'Save Memory' after each one for the best organization.
interview.video_not_supported: Your browser does not support video playback
interview.drag_or_click: Drag or click to select image(s)
interview.initial_question: Tell me about a memorable moment from your life...
interview.tips_content: Share specific details and emotions to make your memories more vivid.
